title: Medieval Weapons Sound Fx Pack
description: The Medieval Weapons Sound FX Pack contains 220 high quality sound effects. This pack is a must have for any game with a medieval/sword based combat setting. There will be continued support for this pack with regular updates.
longDescription:
The Medieval Weapons Sound FX Pack contains 220 high quality sound effects. A list of all sound FX can be found below. This pack is a must have for any game with a medieval/sword based combat setting. There will be continued support for this pack with regular updates.


Demo: https://soundcloud.com/alex-hilder-677989573/medieval-weapons-sound-fx-sample-pack-demo

A list of the contents of the Sound FX pack can be found here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zo_StDncVmXLCssCL0BFmpP2radHqYQeG0s6QiptPaU/edit?usp=sharing
technicalDetails:
Features:

·     Sword hits metal x10

·     Sword hits metal reverb x10

·     Sword hits gore x10

·     Sword swing x 5

·     Sword draw x 5

·     Sword put away x 5

·     Dagger hits metal x10

·     Dagger hits metal reverb x 10

·     Dagger hits gore x 10

·     Dagger swing x 5

·     Dagger draw x 5

·     Dagger put away x 5

·     Heavy sword hits metal x 10

·     Heavy sword hits metal reverb x 10

·     Heavy sword hits gore x 10

·     Heavy sword swing x 5

·     Heavy sword draw x 5

·     Heavy sword put away x 5

·     Axe hits metal x 10

·     Axe hits metal reverb x 10

·     Axe defensive blocks x 10

·     Axe hits gore x 10

·     Axe swing x 5

·     Metal shield hits x 10

·     Metal shield hits reverb x 10

·     Wooden shield hits x 10

·     Wooden shield hits reverb x 10

Number of Audio Wavs: 220

Number of Audio Cues: 220

Sample rate/bit rate: 44.1khz, 16bit Stereo Wav

Do Sound FX loop: No

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
